Effect:
(This card cannot be in your main deck)[Stride] (If the conditions and costs are fulfilled, you may Stride until end of turn.)[CONT]:This card is from all clans and nations.


(This card cannot be in your main deck)[Stride] (Available when both players' vanguards are grade 3 or greater, or if you have a grade 3 or greater vanguard at the beginning of your turn!)-Transcendence Step-[Choose one or more cards with the sum of their grades being 3 or greater from your hand, and discard them] Make this card transcend [Stride] on your (VC) from face down. (When you make this card transcend, it gets the power and card name of one heart. At the end of the turn, return it to your G zone face up)
Flavor: (PR): Shine through the darkness of confusion, great light of truth-!(MBT01 A): That's "Harmony" and "Regeneration"-.(MBT01 B): And, the world is reborn.
Kana: ハーモニクス・メサイア
Name: Harmonics Messiah

Effect: (This card cannot be in your main deck)[Stride] (Released when both players' vanguards are grade 3 or greater!)-Stride Step-[Choose one or more cards with the sum of their grades being 3 or greater from your hand, and discard them] Stride this card on your (VC) from face down.[CONT]:This card is also of all clans and nations.
Flavor: The stars are said to be born from the primeval flames.
Kana: ヒートエレメント マグム
Name: Heat Elemental, Magum

Effect: (This card cannot be in your main deck)[Stride] (Released when both players' vanguards are grade 3 or greater!)-Stride Step-[Choose one or more cards with the sum of their grades being 3 or greater from your hand, and discard them] Stride this card on your (VC) from face down. (When this card strides, it gains the power and card name of one heart. At the end of the turn, return it face up)
Flavor: If it's going to be a passionate fight like this, I too don't have any option but to get fired up!
Kana: サンクチュアリガード・ダイゴ
Kanji: サンクチュアリガード・DAIGO
Name: Sanctuary Guard DAIGO
